## Field.onShortcut() method

Handles the given keyboard shortcut.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onShortcut(_shortcut: KeyboardShortcut): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_shortcut | KeyboardShortcut | The shortcut to be handled. |

<b>Returns:</b>
